original_text: So Joash slept with his fathers, and Jeroboam sat on his throne. And Joash was buried in Samaria with the kings of Israel.
korean_text: 요아스가 그의 조상들과 함께 자매 이스라엘 왕들과 함께 사마리아에 장사되고 여로보암이 그 자리에 앉으니라

sentences.original_text: So Joash slept with his fathers,
and Jeroboam sat on his throne.
And Joash was buried in Samaria with the kings of Israel.
sentences.korean_translation: 요아스는 사마리아에 이스라엘 왕들과 함께 장사되었다.
